name: Master Combat Performer
text: You are a master of the techniques and weapons of the arena and the stage.
prerequisites: Performing Combatant or at least three performance feats, base attack bonus +6.
benefit: You can make performance combat checks as a free action. You are proficient in all weapons with the performance special quality.
staminaText: When you attempt a performance combat check, you can spend up to 5 stamina points to gain a bonus on the check equal to the number of stamina points you spent.
text_zh: 你是一个在角斗场和舞台上表演武艺的大师。
prerequisites_zh: 演武斗士或三项演武专长，BAB+6。
benefit_zh: 你可以用自由动作进行演武检定。你可以像演武武器一样使用所有武器进行演武。
staminaText_zh: 当你尝试演武检定时，你能消耗至多5点耐力来在检定上获得等同于消耗耐力的加值。
